title: As Tonto used to say, "Up Scout!"
content:
Lone Ranger circa 1955

 [‹ Flash, Franklin and Romanian Characters (was: Franklin Gothic Demi with Romanian characters)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014926/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44916 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for a serif mate for Gotham ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014926/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44994 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dezcom

comments.content: Gotta love a show where the two main characters call each other “idiot”.

Humph, that Spanish. [See Wikipedia.]

Tonto speak Potawatame.

[According to [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709014926/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tonto) Kimosabe comes from Ojibaway language. I guess Tonto got around.]]

I wonder how the young Cyrus Highsmith decided on Scout as a name for the Entertainment Weekly typeface? It sure wasn’t from Jay Silverheels!

ChrisL

I’m pretty sure Cyrus is an eagle scout. I can kind of identity, I made it to second class scout before they threw me out.

edit: hmm, it’s not in the Middendorp article, I must be thinking of someone else.

<cite>... Kimosabe comes from Ojibaway language</cite>

& I believe Jay Silverheels was Ojibway
